# W-Kosher Website Improvement Project Instructions

## Project Overview
This project focuses on improving the w-kosher.com WordPress website, specifically:
- Fixing mobile responsiveness issues on secondary pages
- Optimizing HTML pages for desktop display
- Improving overall user experience and performance

## Development Guidelines

### WordPress Theme Development
- Follow WordPress coding standards
- Use proper WordPress hooks and filters
- Ensure theme compatibility with latest WordPress version
- Test on multiple devices and browsers

### Responsive Design Best Practices
- Mobile-first approach
- Use CSS Grid and Flexbox for layouts
- Implement proper breakpoints: 320px, 768px, 1024px, 1200px
- Test on various screen sizes

### CSS/SCSS Structure
- Use BEM methodology for CSS class naming
- Organize SCSS files by components
- Use CSS custom properties for theming
- Minimize CSS bundle size

### JavaScript Development
- Use ES6+ features
- Implement progressive enhancement
- Ensure accessibility compliance
- Optimize for performance

### Testing Requirements
- Cross-browser compatibility testing
- Mobile device testing
- Performance testing with Lighthouse
- Accessibility testing

### Code Quality
- Use semantic HTML
- Follow WCAG 2.1 guidelines
- Optimize images and assets
- Implement proper caching strategies
